content: उत्थित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Risen or rising (as from a seat); वचो निशम्योत्थितमुत्थितः सन् <ls>R. 2. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 10</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 61</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 61</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 15.</ls> {@--2@} Raised, gone up; पांशुः <ls>Śi. 5. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 33</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 1</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">17. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Rescued, saved; <ls>Ratn. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Born, produced, sprung up, arisen; वचः <ls>R. 2. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 49</ls>; broken out (as fire); अग्निः <ls>Ratn. 4. 14</ls>; हृदयेऽग्निरिवोत्थितः <ls>R. 4. 2.</ls> burst into a flame. {@--5@} Striving, active, diligent; <ls>Kām. 1. 17</ls>; <ls n="Kām.">8. 49.</ls> {@--6@} Increasing, growing (in strength), advancing. {@--7@} Bounded up, rebounded; पतिता उत्थिता <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--8@} Occurring. {@--9@} High, lofty, eminent. {@--10@} Extended, stretched; आपर्वभाग° <ls>Ś. 4. 4.</ls> {@--11@} An epithet of a Pragātha consisting of ten Pādas.
